title: iPhone X DROP TEST - The most Expensive glass ever on a smartphone!!
description: iPhone X vs iPhone 8 plus during a drop test. Apple has claimed that their glass is the 'most durable glass ever in a smartphone'... and well... my last two drop tests have proved that to be completely false. Glass is glass.  iPhone 8 drop test round one:  iPhone 8 drop test round two:  If you are curious about how durable the iPhone 8 plus is without a case, its time to watch the iPhone 8 plus drop test and see for yourself. The iPhone X does have the stainless steel sides, which will probably give it a durability advantage... But there is only one way to find out.
